sentences.0: Last night, I went to a nearby gastropub called The Cow Pizza Kitchen and Bar.

sentences.0: My wife brought me to Cow Pizza Kitchen for my birthday.

sentences.5: Many people like this dish but just didn't like the texture.

sentences.7: Thinly sliced radishes atop ricotta cheese in a spiral dish was phenomenal.
sentences.8: I also tried the boudin blanc and was a lot like a bratwurst but way juicer and full of flavor.
sentences.9: I would definitely recommend for a true Gastropub experience!
